mapper.sql: id, name, birthday, school, major_course, major_grade, star, status, remark, creator, create_time, operator, operate_time

mapper.update:
update teacher
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major_course = #{majorCourse,jdbcType=TINYINT},
major_grade = #{majorGrade,jdbcType=TINYINT},
star = #{star,jdbcType=BIT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update teacher set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_course = #{majorCourse,jdbcType=TINYINT}, major_grade = #{majorGrade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, star = #{star,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
